text.section:
The provisions of this title apply to benefit limited liability companies except to the extent that:
The context of a provision clearly requires otherwise; or
A specific provision of this title provides otherwise.
This subtitle applies only to a benefit limited liability company.

section.section: The existence of a provision of this subtitle does not of itself create any implication that a contrary or different rule of law is or would be applicable to a limited liability company that is not a benefit limited liability company.
This subtitle does not affect any statute or rule of law as it applies to a limited liability company that is not a benefit limited liability company.

text.section: A provision of the articles of organization or operating agreement of a benefit limited liability company may not be inconsistent with any provision of this subtitle.
